text: llh taealaa malayikat yteaqbwn ealaa al'iinsan min bayn yadayh wamin khlfh, yahfazunah bi'amr allah wyhswn ma yasdur eanh min khayr 'aw shr. 'iina allah subhanah wteala la yghyir niematan 'aneamaha ealaa qawm 'illa 'iidha ghyaru ma 'amarahum bih feswh. wa'iidha 'arad allah bjmaet bla'an fala mfrr mnh, walays lahum min dun allah min wal yatawalaa amwrhm, fyjlb lahum almhbwb, wayadfae eanhum almkrwh
